name: Derbent 3121 Grey  - 120 x 180cm
description:
This exclusive collection is pure luxury and comfort. Its ultra-dense pile is made from soft acrylic with textured finishes, ranging from high & low to drop-stitch techniques to create an opulent effect on floor spaces. The soft tones used in these rugs also add to their understated elegance and make them highly versatile for any decor.

Features

  • Machine-knotted
  • Heat-set acrylic
  • Easy to Clean
  • Stain Resistant
  • Moth Resistant
  • Made in Turkey
